basics.name: Jeffrey Xing
basics.label: Ph.D. Candidate @ UCSD Psychology
basics.summary: Researcher studying how people/songbirds perceive emotional expressions in vocal communications over time.

work.name: Gentner Lab / Auditory Neuroscience Laboratory, University of California San Diego
work.summary: Conduct behavioral and neuroimaging studies on how people perceive emotional valence changes over time when listening to others speak naturally. Design studies that examine medical student empathy. Build acoustic and machine learning analyses of birdsong. Assess preference of songbirds to songs with different acoustic statistics.

work.name: Gentner Lab / Auditory Neuroscience Laboratory, University of California San Diego
work.summary: Annotated birdsong acoustic and analyzed them using information theoretic and rhythmic approaches.

work.name: Department of Music, University of California San Diego
work.summary: Produced concert recordings for archival and contemporary music research.

work.name: Department of Music, University of California San Diego

volunteer.summary: Helped select and mentor 2 CoB-KIBM Scholars for summer 2025.
Organized schedules and hospitality for 7 visiting researchers.
Solicited and represented graduate student feedback in 4 UCSD Psychology hiring decisions.

education.area: Psychology with a Specialization in Sensation and Perception, Interdisciplinary Computing and the Arts Major (Music)

awards.title: Graduate Research Fellowship (NSF GRFP)
awards.summary: The NSF GRFP recognizes outstanding graduate students who demonstrate the potential to make significant contributions in STEM.

awards.title: Norman Henry Anderson Honors Thesis Award
Richard L. and Fern W. Erion and Laidlaw-Erion Scholarship
Academic Enrichment Program Summer Research Scholarship
Halıcıoğlu Data Science Institute Undergraduate Scholarship

publications.name: Cortical temporal dynamics of speech perception: Dissociating linguistic and paralinguistic elements (Poster Presentation)
publications.summary: Presenting pilot magnetoencephalography (MEG) data on how brains process speech emotion over time.

publications.name: Cortical temporal dynamics of tracking linguistic and paralinguistic elements (Poster Presentation)
publications.summary: Presented novel real-time speech emotion assessment methods and showed emotion perception involves flexible selection of emotion information sources in real-time.

publications.name: Syntactic modulation of rhythm in Australian pied butcherbird song
publications.summary: Proposed novel framework of bioacoustic complexity by jointly analyzing song syntax and rhythm.

publications.name: Examining song complexity of Australian pied butcherbirds
publications.summary: Demonstrated bioacoustic characteristics of Australian pied butcherbird songs by analyzing the relationship between song rhythm and syntax.

projects.name: Quantum Computing
projects.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.
